EARMARKChildNode, EARMARKHierarchicalNode, EARMARKItem, EARMARKNode, java.lang.Cloneable
public class Element
extends MarkupItem

This class represents a concrete element in the EARMARK model.

Author:
Silvio Peroni

Constructor Detail

Element

protected Element(EARMARKDocument d,
                  java.lang.String gi,
                  java.net.URI ns,
                  Collection.Type type,
                  java.net.URI id)
Create an element.

Parameters:
d - the document to which this item is associated.
gi - the general identifier associated to this markup item.
ns - the namespace associated to this markup item.
type - the collection type associated to this markup item. Possible values: must be Collection.Type.Set, Collection.Type.Bag and Collection.Type.List.
id - the identifier for this item.
